snippet: Six companies with links to the regime of President Bashar al-Assad and 29 Syrian government officials were added to the United State’s list of those subject to sanctions.
lead_paragraph: Six companies with links to the regime of President Bashar al-Assad and 29 Syrian government officials were added to the United State’s list of those subject to sanctions.

headline.seo: U.S. Adds Companies and Syrian Officials to Sanction List
headline.main: U.S. Adds Companies and Syrian Officials to Sanction List
